channel.title: CVE Feed for VMware -- VMware AirWatch Console (AWC)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VMware -- VMware AirWatch Console (AWC)

item.title: CVE-2017-4931|2024-09-16T20:48:08.283Z -- vmware -- vmware%20airwatch%20console%20%28awc%29
item.description: VMware AirWatch Console 9.x prior to 9.2.0 contains a vulnerability that could allow an authenticated AWC user to add malicious data to an enrolled device's log files. Successful exploitation of this issue could result in an unsuspecting AWC user opening a CSV file which contains malicious content.
